channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Southeast Asia’s Muslim market comes of age—and authenticity is in
item.description: From banking to fashion, local businesses are targeting a growing middle-class consumer base keen to buy 'halal'.

item.title: Firing Powell would hurt the dollar and U.S. economy, France says
item.description: “Donald Trump has hurt the credibility of the dollar with his aggressive moves on tariffs—for a long time,” French Finance Minister Eric Lombard said.

item.title: More companies than ‘normal’ are withdrawing guidance for the quarter as uncertainty about tariffs looms, UBS analyst says
item.description: CFOs "don’t have the visibility to provide discrete guidance for the quarter,” David Lefkowitz, head of US equities at UBS Global Wealth Management, t...

item.title: The Trump administration’s DEI rollbacks slashes stress-free zones for college students. ‘It feels like we’re going back’
item.description: The full scope of campus DEI rollbacks is still emerging as colleges respond to the Trump administration’s orders against diversity practices.

item.title: Investors want to know what firms are spending more than earning
item.description: The hope is that their stance on big expenditures, like real estate or major machinery, will offer clarity into how they see the economy.

item.title: 99% of the ‘biggest winning stocks’ share this criteria, says investing legend
Why silver could finally be a better investment opportunity than gold
Trump won’t fire Powell — but he could still pressure the Fed. Here's how.
The ‘smart money’ index is acting unusual. It could be a buying opportunity.
Why Trump Media once again called out ‘naked short selling’ as its stock dropped
